dimensions:
Height: 30.6 cm (12 in.)

title: Study of a Zoomorphic Rock, Petra
description: A strangely colored rock in the right foreground looks like a standing quadruped. Two caves are shown at its base. It is flanked at left by the head of another animal. A hill ridge is shown in the left rear. Cloudy sky.
name: Drawing
